description: Lists all managed policies that are attached to the specified IAM role.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: By listing attached role policies, attackers can understand the permissions associated with specific roles, which is essential for discovering permission groups within a cloud environment.
Attackers may use the information from this API call to gain insight into valid roles and associated policies, which can help them identify which roles to target for credential access.
This technique is applicable because the API call provides information on the configuration and setup of IAM roles and their policies, contributing to the discovery of cloud services configurations.

incidents.description: Compromised Cloud Compute Credentials: Case Studies From the Wild

securityImplications: Attackers might use ListAttachedRolePolicies to identify and exploit permissions associated with various roles in AWS.
